SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Well met, Watchers. You have been summoned
unto this land to bear witness to the battle
between we witches and the foul scourge
known as the Calamity. I am the Arch Witch, and on behalf
of all in the Witchdom Pulchra,
I bid you welcome.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text: Wait, a witch!? Yay! This is a witch world! But wait, does this mean I can be a witch!? Can I say 'abracadabra!' and make all sorts of wild things happen!?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
You sure seem fired up about this, Formina,
but I ain't gettin' that kinda vibe from
this place. Let's just get our mitts on
the triangle and mosey on outta here.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Unacceptable. You are the Watchers;
it is your solemn duty to bear witness
to our battle with Calamity. Until you have seen that duty done,
I will not permit your search.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text: And what happens when we say no?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
While I have great respect for Watchers,
I place more importance upon the people
of this land—so if you do not accept your
role graciously, it may go poorly for you.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Man, I can't believe witches are real...
But fine, we'll do it: we'll fulfill this
'Watcher' duty you keep talking about. But when we're done, we need you to help us
find the triangle we're looking for.
I think that's fair, don't you?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
That is all we witches desire, and so
it is agreed. Now then, one of our own
awaits outside to serve as your guide.
Please accompany her.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_DISASTER_000_CUT_010_0.text:
Don't look like we got a choice either way now.
Let's hope this witchy war thing is over quick—
or better yet, that we MAKE it end quick.
C'mon, girl, shake your spurs.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.text: I see something on the water.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLACK.text:
Some sort of divination? Strange...
I suppose I'll keep what it said
in mind either way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.text: I see something on the ground.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_YELLO.text: That made no sense at all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_WHITE.text: I see a face on that weapon, but whose?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.text:
I see what looks like a
person's face in the flames.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_RED_0.text:
This must be the work of someone who
has an axe to grind with the witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.text: There's a human face on that trunk.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_BLUE_.text:
Whoever this is clearly wants to scare us,
but I'm not afraid at all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_00.text:
I knew you were alive;
this was all a little too perfect.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_01.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_01.text:
Ah, it appears the Watchers can see through
all manner of tricks. You must know exactly
what I intend to do, then?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_02.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_ASSASIN_000_CUT_000_02.text: Yes—so let's join up and get going.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
So it's finally time to set out...
Oh, I feel like my heart is going
to beat right out of my chest!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_020.text: You should focus on being a witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_WILLMA_000_CUT_000_030.text:
*sigh* Yes, I thought so as well.
Thank you, Watcher.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_210_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_210_CU.text: Watching is demanding in its own way.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_220_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_220_CU.text: Just a little more, I think?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_250_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_OUTPOST_CONTROL_250_CU.text:
All of this sitting around
and watching is making me antsy.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Victory now lies beyond the witches' grasp;
aiding them is naught but wasted effort.
Yet you two can end all with a thought,
if you but desire it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Actually, we still have something
we need to do here.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text: You may leave all that to me.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_OUTPO.text:
Wise choice, Watchers. By your wills
alone are the fate of the witches set.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
We'd best start by figurin' out what we're
dealin' with in this here Calamity thing.
Can't fight your enemy if you don't know
who or what it is, after all!

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.text:
I know this is exciting, Bonnie, but I don't
think we're supposed to do any fighting.
We're Watchers, remember?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_011.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_011.text:
Shoot, that's all just a buncha official
posturin' and whatnot; there's plenty'a
ways to intervene in a war and still
keep yourself nice and neutral.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Are you the witch who
will be escorting us?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_030.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_030.text:
Trust not the witches, Watchers, for they
would use your power only to traverse
the Conjoined Worlds for themselves.
Trust not the witches.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_040.text:
Y'know, I reckon a world of magic like
this is gonna be messy as all get out
Probably full of schemin' and whatnot.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_041.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_041.text:
This is how childhood dreams die, isn't it?
Let's just make sure we don't get ourselves
dragged into the mud with everyone else.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_060.text:
Hey there! You the Watchers? 'Cause I was
kinda expecting somebody super impressive,
and you seem like nobodies... No offense.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_070.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_070.text:
Well that's...blunt. Still, looks like the witches have their
aggressively youthful types, which means
my dream isn't dead yet—so how about you
tell us what we're supposed to do here?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_080.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_080.text:
The Arch Witch didn't explain ANYTHING?
No witches, no Calamity, nothing?
Sheesh, okay. Sure.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_090.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_090.text:
Right then! Intros. So I'm Ameya Aisling,
one of the witches of the white. That's important, because here in the
Witchdom Pulchra, witches are divided
into five separate colors, each one
with their own land.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_170.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_170.text:
Calamities are a side effect of our magic usage,
which means they like places with lots of power.
So right now, this crystallization is slowly taking
over all of our domains.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_180.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_180.text:
Well, heck, darlin'! Why not stop usin'
magic if it's causin' such a fuss?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_190.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_190.text:
You might as well tell us to stop being
witches—which is a non-starter, by the way.
This is why we stand against the Calamity:
because otherwise, we won't be witches anymore.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_200.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_200.text:
But it's not all doom and gloom! Fighting a
Calamity is one of those once-in-a-lifetime
things, so we try to make it a real party. Break out the big spells, throw everything
we've got into each battle... Just have fun
while we try not to die, basically! I know that probably seems weird to
you guys, but that's how it is.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_201.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_201.text:
So how you fight's more important than
winning or losing? Doesn't sound like
much of a strategy to me.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_210.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_210.text:
And yet, this is how they fought—and won—
against countless Calamities in the past,
so we should let them do as they like.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_220.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_220.text:
Glad to hear it! So here's where you fit in:
as this generation's Watcher—or Watchers,
I guess—it's your duty to oversee our war.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_230.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_230.text:
But where we go and what we watch
is for us to decide, right?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_040.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_040.text:
Hang on. You want us to not trust witches
in a world that's plumb full of 'em?
Also, wasn't whoever just said that
ALSO a durn witch?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_060.text:
You're the Watchers, right? Uh, but why are
you just...standing there? Your faces look
like you're trying to do math or something.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_080.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_080.text: A strange person spoke to us.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_090.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_090.text: They told us not to trust witches.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_100.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_100.text:
Whaaat!? Okay, who said that?
What'd they look like!?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_110.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_110.text: We couldn't see their face or get a read on their age or anything distinguishing. But more importantly, who are you?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_120.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_120.text:
Eeep! Sorry about that. I know it
sucks to get bombarded with questions
the moment you show up someplace. Right, so I'm Ameya, a witch of the white,
and I've been ordered to guide you two.
Nice to meetcha!

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_121.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_121.text:
Hey, if you say so! Anyway, I'm Ameya,
a witch of the white, and I've been
ordered to guide you. Nice to meetcha!

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_140.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_140.text:
Oh, I know. The Arch Witch already
told me everything about you both.

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_150.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_150.text:
So, anything you want to ask up front,
or do you just wanna get to watching?

SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_180.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_WRLD_BOFO_AMYA_100_CUT_000_180.text:
All righty! So here's the deal:
Pulchra's witches are divided
into five different colors.

SUB_W02_SCAN_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_SCAN_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_000.text:
Seems like there's plenty of trouble afoot,
so anywhere it's bubbling up would probably
be a good place for us to start.

SUB_W02_SCAN_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_SCAN_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_010.text:
Is that, like, Watcher intuition?
Can we trust it?

SUB_W02_SCAN_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_SCAN_BOFO_AMYA_000_CUT_000_020.text:
Well, we don't have time to be
waffling around here, so yes.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Been a while.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Sure has! You doing well, Grete?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Can't complain. Who's this?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
They're the Watchers. The Arch Witch
and Mom told me to keep an eye on...
Er, I mean, to show 'em around.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Hello, Grete.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Um... Actually, let's do this later.
Things are fine here. No worries. Bye.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Not the most friendly greeting
I've ever had, if I'm honest.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oh, don't let it get to you. She's shy,
so it'll take a little time for her
to get used to talking to you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Ooh, a Calamity fiend! It's Ameya's
time to shine! Stay back, Watchers!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: No, YOU stay back!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: By all means.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Sorry, Grete! I know this is the battleground
of the black, but I sorta forgot I'm a witch
of the white and just...you know. Acted?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Oh, that's all right—I know that's just the
sort of person you are. I'll make sure the
Black Sage doesn't find out, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
She talks to you, but won't even spare
us a glance. It's a bit sad, actually.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Sorry, that's really not how she means
to come off, but I know it's awkward.
Just please cut her a little slack?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
A stranger has stolen victory on the
battleground of the black. This will
earn me a scolding most fearsome
from the Black Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Winning against the Calamity seems
like it should be the priority here,
not who actually secures the victory.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: Just leave. I don't want you here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
I'm starting to doubt my talent
in the whole Watcher department.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text:
Um, yeah? Look, I know the Arch Witch said you
can do whatever you want, but did you SEE her
reaction there? It'd be hard to call what you
did any kind of a good move.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: The Watchers? More like the halfwits!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: She talked to us! Yay!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLA.text: You are seriously weird Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Why have you come to the battleground
of the yellow, Ameya?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I'm showing the Watchers around.
Arch Witch and Mom's orders.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Oh dear. I'm terribly sorry to hear that. You do have perfect timing though, because there's a matter I want to discuss. It appears the Dusk Pinwheel and the Yellow Sage have flown off somewhere.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: I'm sorry, the pinwheel flew away?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Yeaaah? Why wouldn't it?
Of all our flying pinwheels that's
by far the biggest, though.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I mean, no idea why it would fly off in
the middle of the Calamity, but I'm sure
you'll sort it out with the Yellow Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Sure, assuming they come back.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Willma, look! A Calamity fiend!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
I, a proud witch of the yellow,
will handle this!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Knock yourself out.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Nope! This one's mine!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
It proved a difficult fight without
the Yellow Sage, but we managed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
It looks like your pinwheel
has flown off again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Argh! I knew it! It's all my fault!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
You said you had something you wanted
to talk about earlier, Willma. What was it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Oh, it's nothing. The Dusk Pinwheel is
a problem for witches of the yellow, so I
can't possibly discuss it with a white witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Yeah, I guess that makes sense.
Hang in there, okay!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text: Thanks, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
You took that in stride. Are there some
kind of class divisions based on color?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
No, all the colors are equal. That's why
it's good manners to not interfere with
other witchy biz, ya know?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
But witch rules like that don't apply to
Watchers, so I'd like to check out that
flying windmill up close.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Hey, you wanna look into the windmill,
I say go for it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
This is the first time I've seen someone
other than a witch fight. How interesting.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_YEL.text:
Non-witches just can't cut it. *sigh*
I should have seen that coming.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Well, well. If it isn't the infamous Watchers.
Do you really think these strangers' blood
is fit for joining with us witches, Ameya?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
I know how much that sort of thing interests
you, Red Orchid, but I'm pretty sure that's not
what the Arch Witch meant when she told me
to serve as their guide.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text: Which means she's probably sneaking a peep at us in her magic mirror as we speak— and I'm sure she'll love it! Ha!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text: They look like they're having fun.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
So you have come to the Witchdom at last,
Watchers. Do enjoy yourselves, now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Eee hee! Wonderful! Now let yourself
be captivated by a witch of the red!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
O fiends of the Calamity, enjoy both
pleasure and pain from my crimson fires!
Behna ascatella!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text: This woman clearly doesn't need our help.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Eh, I wouldn't be so sure. Yes, we fight
with a distinct edge when the Red Orchid
is directly involved in a battle, but she
can't be everywhere at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Fair enough. I suppose if she were
enough to end the battle on her own,
you wouldn't need Watchers at all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
Hey! What kind of IDIOTS go and steal
someone's limelight like that, huh!? Still, seeing you fight absolutely
did captivate me, so... I want your blood. I want it.
Give it to me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_RED.text:
The Watchers should maybe stick to watching.
Ugh. Begone. I've no need of your blood.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
This is Lita Caryx, a witch of the blue.
I brought the Watcher with me, Lita!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
I'm Formina, and this is Bonnie.
We're searching for triangles,
but right now we're your Watchers.
Also, have we met somewhere before?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
No, you must be imagining things. But more to
the point, you two are the ones who've been
going around working to seduce my dear Ameya.
Who exactly ARE you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
You've got the wrong idea, but the fact
you're so pushy about really makes me
want to start causing trouble.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Cool it, Lita! Just tell us how it's going
with the fight against the Calamity
and the battlefield of the blue.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
We're still researching the Calamity fiends.
So far, we've learned our wood magic offers
no real advantage against them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
In that case, you'll have to fight
'em more and gather more intel.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Exactly. And sorry to jump right into it,
but we've got fiends on the scene.
Make way, Watchers!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text: I'll make way—right into this fight!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Run along to the next place and get to
watching already. THAT is your duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_BLU.text:
Ameya, can you get these two out of here?
They're seriously in the way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
Look! Something's gathering
at the Brilliant Tower!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
We did it! We've destroyed
all of the crystals!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_01.text:
Hold up! It feels like... Hey, yeah!
The five castles have all completed
their barrier spells, which means
we managed to protect the Witchdom!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
I always thought witches were something
we become, but now I see I was wrong.
We've been witches from the start.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
We don't save the world—we're part of it.
Do you see? We ARE Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
The world has been screaming for us to help it,
and I finally heard its cries. WE are to blame
for this! WE brought about the Calamities!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_02.text:
Fiends are the cries of the Calamity,
and one witch is connected to another
by some force that we can't see.
I...I understand that now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
The Calamity is ended, Watchers.
Your duty is nearly complete.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
It would appear you possess the power to
choose your own fate; a choice which is
yours by right. Not even we witches have
the ability to intervene in this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
As for you, Ameya, your duty continues:
I bid you experience the Watchers' choices
by their side. Once you have done this,
I will await you in the Brilliant Tower.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_DISASTER_CLEAR_00.text:
The Arch Witch knows your choices will affect
the fate of the witches of Pulchra, Watchers.
And I know this is weird to say, but... Well, if you've come to understand anything
about us witches, I just hope you make the
best choice for us. Please.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: You are arrived, Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
You acted in accordance with your mission
and oversaw our war with the Calamity.
Now it is the turn of we witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Ameya, your destiny has been decided:
you shall shoulder the burden of the
final battle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
But am I strong enough for that?
Because if I fail, the Witchdom will...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
You will have all of the witches of Pulchra
behind you—myself included. Rest easy,
child, for you do not fight alone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: I understand—and I'm going to win!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: You've got this, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: We're also going to fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Thanks. Watch over me, okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Sorry, but no. This fight belongs to the
witches, and I can't entrust it to Watchers.
But thanks all the same—and know I'll carry
your feelings with me into battle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Our watch is over, and we managed to
get the triangle we need—so now we'll
do whatever we want!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: What you SHOULD do is leave this world.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
You're right. But like I said, I don't feel like
just sitting around watching Ameya fight.
Bonnie and I are just the kind of girls who
like to get our hands dirty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
If that is your decision, then so be it—
for even if you lose, Ameya will be there.
Let your mind rest easy and fight.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: We did it! We won!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Great job, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Thanks, Watchers. I feel like I only
survived because of all the things
I saw and did when I was with you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Well maybe what mattered wasn't us Watchers,
but the witch who rode along with us,
if ya catch my meanin'.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Such praise from the Watchers! And you, Ameya,
have grown by leaps and bounds; I rest easy
knowing that whatever the future may hold
for me, Pulchra will be secure.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Now then, Watchers. The time
has come for your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shard—
or perhaps it would be better to call it
a seed of the Calamity. Regardless, I would
have you take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
By which you mean take it and
never come back to Pulchra?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
That is correct. And though you were here
for but a short time, know that we witches
will never forget you... Now begone!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Everything went beautifully because
of you Watchers. Thank you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: So long, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Ameya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Ameya has been turned to crystal.
Her actions, however, have brought
the witches a great victory this day.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
Now then, Watchers. The time has come
for your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shard—
or perhaps it would be better to call it
a seed of the Calamity. Regardless, I would
have you take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text:
So this is our destiny, I guess?
And so long as we have this thing,
we can never return to Pulchra?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_000_CU.text: Correct. Now take your leave.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
So this is the Watchers' true power?
It's... It's incredible!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Thank you, Watchers. And now, at long last,
we are come to your final duty.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
I bequeath unto you this Calamity Shard—
or perhaps it would be better to call it
a seed of the Calamity. Regardless, I would
have you take it away to the Conjoined Worlds.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
You have taken the Calamity Shard into yourselves.
As such, neither of you can ever be permitted
to set foot in the Witchdom again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
So a Watcher's true role is to serve
as a tool that completely eliminates
the Calamity from Pulchra?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Wait, Arch Witch! Please! I beg of you, permit me to leave Pulchra.
I want to travel with the Watchers and
see their journey through to the end.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Ah, but this is a beautiful end indeed.
You are a witch, Ameya; your path is yours
to choose. I ask only that you return to us
once you have seen all that you can.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text: I will, Arch Witch—and thank you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
Get ready, Watchers, 'cause I'm coming!
And don't bother saying I can't,
because it's WAY too late!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text: We'd be happy to have you, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_010_CU.text:
The Watchers were defeated, but this is good—
for the battle with the Calamity is one for
witches to fight, and it is only right that
we assume control. Now come, Ameya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Wait, hold up. This is the Brilliant Tower.
We can't go in there without permission
from the Arch Witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: It's fine. Let's go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Did the Arch Witch really summon you?
...Eh! Not my problem.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Well, I guess we're in here now...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Your duty is not complete, Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
But our coming into the Brilliant Tower was
supposed to be the end of our Watcher duty,
which means we need our triangle.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Isn't that right, Grey Witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
No! Your duty is not yet finished!
Now take the Calamity Shard
and leave this world!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Well, heck! If that shard ain't the triangle
we've been lookin' for, I dunno what is!
Are you sayin' we never even needed to do
this whole Watcher thing in the first place?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
So the Grey Witch had it from the start?
Okay, which one of you tricked us?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
I planned to help you take the triangle
from her once your duties were fulfilled.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
And you couldn't have simply
told us that from the jump?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
The path to the Brilliant Tower would not have
opened until you knew the truth of the witches.
It is not as simple as merely handing over
the triangle and being done with it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
We got used and abused like a rented mule!
But since we got the triangle we needed,
it don't matter none. Now let's get on
out of here while the gettin's good.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Why are you going on about triangles!?
Also, what's the Grey Witch!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
You'll need to determine that
for yourself, Ameya.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: What is the Grey Witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
We're also searching for the truth.
You have to find the truth of Pulchra.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Well, Ameya, it sure was a hoot
watchin' over all this with you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Come to think of it, we never did learn
what the deal was with the Grey Witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Ask yourself this, Watchers: what color
is formed by the merging of them all? Indeed, it is grey—and I, the Grey Witch,
am the ultimate being, one who carries the
strength of all the colors of the Witchdom. And from this point forward, Pulchra will
assume the hue of the grey, as will all
the witches that abide within.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
A grey world sounds pretty boring.
So what happens after you do that?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Once this is done, I will turn all the Conjoined Worlds to grey— all life to grey. Aye, for this is the way the universe ought to be—yourselves included, Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Talk about your high-falutin' ambitions!
Well, Formina? What should we do?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: Let Ameya and the Arch Witch handle it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text: I think we should step in.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Pulchra matters should be handled
by Pulchra witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
Sounds good—but we'll be waitin'
for you in Capitol City, Grey Witch!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
You think a pair of Watchers can prevail
against the might of the Grey Witch!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
You are no longer the Watchers, and must
take your leave from this place at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: ArchWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
...And yet, grey magic is powerful indeed.
So before I bid you hence, I will make use
of your strength one last time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.speaker: GreyWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_900_CU.text:
I feel my power...fading? No... No!
Must I truly wait for the next Calamity!?
The next Watcher!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
I figured you'd do it,
Ladies Who Used To Be The Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
I think it's time you called us by our names.
I'm Bonnie Blair, and that's Formina Franklyn.
Pretty saucy pair'a handles, ain't they?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Oh sure, they're really something.
But howzabout I call you that AFTER
you fulfill your final duty?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Don't worry, we're going to take the
Calamity Shard away; it's nothing but
a triangle to us, anyway. So for now,
I guess this is farewell.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_LASTBATTLE_910_CU.text:
Byeee, Bonnie! Byeee Formina!
I'll see you both in another world!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
In the name of Grete, witch of the black,
I command you to burst!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
That's AMAZING, Grete! You took out
all of the Calamity fiends at once!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: That's not quite accurate; it wasn't me who did it, but this grey staff. It's powerful—so powerful—and... and I think I'm afraid of it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Which is why I need you to take it. If I keep it,
it'll eventually start fighting with my own staff,
and that's no good for anyone. A witch only has
room in her heart for one staff, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You got it, girl! Er, but lemme know
if you ever need it back, 'kay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
And on that note, here's a staff, Watchers!
I don't want it to start fighting with
my own staff, 'cause that'd be a mess.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yay! Now I can use this to become a witch!
Abracadabra! Hocus-pocus! Zappy zappy! ...Also, you're right: this staff DOES
have a super weird vibe to it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Ah, excellent timing. It turns out I actually
need the grey staff back—for without it,
I won't be able to defeat the Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
But what about your staff, Grete?
Won't they just start fighting?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, which is why I'm going to
throw mine away. The old
thing is weak anyway.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Whaaaaaat!? C'mon! I mean, that staff awakened
you to black magic, right? At least let me take care
of it until the Calamity's done.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, I suppose that
would be all right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Now as for the grey staff...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
...SERIOUSLY!? Well, okay. I understand,
and I won't say anything to anyone else.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: What did you and Grete talk about?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Did you not hear me JUST say I wasn't
gonna tell anyone? Butt out!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Grete said this old castle is where she
first got her hands on the grey staff.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Is the place special or something?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
This is a place witches must never go—
although hearing that only makes a girl
want to do it all the more! We all used to try and come in here as kids—
sort of a test of courage, I guess. But the
one time I tried, the door was locked and I
couldn't find another way inside.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Still, kids do manage to get in from
time to time, and it always turns into
a massive deal. But since I don't remember Grete ever
stirring up a fuss, I guess she only
came here super recently.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Anyway, I got delayed by a bunch of things
and never ended up getting back this way.
But now that we're here, I really need to
give it a thorough look-around. I mean, Grete's been acting crazy weird.
Did you see how she tossed her staff out?
That is NOT a thing witches do.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
You definitely make it sound like this
is a situation that needs looking into.
And that grey staff... Well, it gave me
the same vibes as the Calamity itself.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
If that's your Watcher's intuition talking,
then I'm seriously liking this less and less.
Anyway, let's check out the castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Uh, didn't you JUST say
you couldn't go in?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I couldn't—but Grete got in,
so there HAS to be a way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: All right, I'll do what I can.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Now let's go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Seems like the door was
the only thing closed up.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Nothing weird around here though.
Just a mirror.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Although this IS a world of magic, so you'd
think the mirror could talk or something.
...Hey there, mirror. How goes it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Quite well, thank you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I have been ever so delighted at the sudden
increase in guests. Now please, make a request
of me. What does your heart desire?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I can't believe it actually talks... Uh, right. Sorry about this, but I
actually have a question for you:
Grete got a grey staff here, right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A question, is it? Excellent! Indeed,
one of my duties is to answer any
and all questions asked of me. As for your witch, she made but one request:
a wish for power. Such a simple request
deserved a simple answer, so I provided
her with a staff of great might.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
So you gave it to her?
Or is there someone else here?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: The staff came from beyond that gate.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Alas, you cannot pass through it;
it is a gateway for witches alone.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
So it's definitely not your
ordinary staff, is it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Mirror
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
A fine question! That is a grey staff,
the ultimate staff, hewn from the lifelong
efforts of the Grey Witch. And speaking of
the Grey Witch...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
What are you gossiping about,
young ladies!? Show some manners!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text: Are you the Grey Witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Me? A witch? Ha! Oh, there truly are nothing
but idiots like you on the outside! No wonder
they're having trouble with the Calamity. But now that the grey staff has abandoned this
castle, the Calamity will soon be brought to
heel—and on that day, witches of all colors
will bow before the power of the grey!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
I don't know what the power of the grey is,
but I know we don't need it! We can take out
the Calamity just fine on our own, thank you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
In that case, you will never attain the victory
you desire. Not that it matters...because you
will also never leave this castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
We got the info we needed, so there's
no reason to be here any longer.
Come on, Ameya. Let's go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Did you not hear me, you rude things!?
You cannot leave this castle!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Sounds like a witch rule,
not a Watcher one.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Old_Woman
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
Watchers!? Damnation!
Stop them, you lot!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_OLD_CASTLE_000_CU.text:
She was clearly buying time.
Let's hurry back to Grete.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Where's Grete?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: She went to Castle Black Swan—right after unleashing a magic so powerful it destroyed every Calamity fiend in sight! Oh, but before she took off, she said: 'Now the way to Castle Black Swan is clear.' Er, whatever that means.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The only way to the castle is through
an underground waterway. Let's go!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: I hear Grete went to Castle Black Swan?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yes, she came through a short while ago.
But you may not pass, for you are not
a witch of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: What about if we're Watchers?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Black_Witch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Watchers!? ...Very well, do as you please.
But know this: The guards of this waterway
care not for your esteemed position, Watchers;
they will attack any who are not of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Your concern is appreciated.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Getting to Castle Black Swan is a real
pain—just like everything else here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
The power of the grey is greater than the black;
I learned as much when I wielded this staff.
Now leave the fight with the Calamity to me,
for I can win the day with ease!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You mustn't surrender yourself to the power
of the grey, Grete, for it is no different
from the Calamity itself—and using such
a power to best it would be no victory.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Yet black magic is no match for the
Calamity! Indeed, it is useless!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
For you witches of Pulchra, this fight
is about using your witch powers
to triumph over the Calamity.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
C'mon, Grete! Wake up already!
The black staff is your REAL staff!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
We have to get her back
from the grey staff.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
If you enter into this conflict, Watchers,
that witch will forfeit her life. However, I have mastery of a trick which can
make it so the grey staff is damaged
while the witch is left unharmed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
An attractive offer—but can you
actually pull it off?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Do you truly have the time
to be doubting me?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: ...Fine, go ahead.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
While the power of the grey staff remains,
Grete, I want you to cast a spell with me—
using your own black staff, of course.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Right!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I can't believe I got to cast a spell
with the Black Sage herself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
And why not, Grete? For it was I who gave you
that staff in order to awaken the power of
the black that sleeps within you. It is a staff of unhurried power that
matches your own talents within.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
You are the type who makes slow progress—
a trait which gives you the ability to
impact things greatly. I know you wish to proceed at the same speed as
other youthful witches, for that is what it means
to be young. But such feelings created an opening
that invited the power of the grey.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I should have explained that to you more directly,
but I thought your haste and fretting would lead
to growth as a witch of the black, and so left
you to your own devices. Pray forgive me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
I...I fear you praise me overmuch, Black Sage.
But I will continue in my own unhurried way
to work hard and hone my skills as a proud
witch of the black.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text:
Looks like we're all good here.
Back to the watching!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: A moment, Watchers. I believed we had no need of your presence on our battlefield, but see now that I was mistaken; times such as these are exactly when we need your overarching perspectives. You have helped me to see this, and I am grateful beyond words.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: I'm glad it all worked out.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLACK.text: Thank you again, Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
I can't believe this thing flies...
Is it really just a pinwheel?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Well, it's not gonna open its mouth up and
attack you or anything, so you don't have
to worry about that. Anyway, let's go talk
to the Yellow Sage!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
You cannot enter without permission, witch
of the white—and what's more, those two are
not even witches! Aye, but the pinwheel is in
foul spirits right now. Foul spirits indeed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text: Sorry, your pinwheel is in foul spirits?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Someone caused the pinwheel's compass to move,
which made it float off this way and that.
That is why it is in foul spirits—and why I am, as well.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
This must be what Willma
was talking about.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Pah! Willma is an apprentice witch, and nothing
more—she lacks the strength to interfere with
the compass. If it were so simple as all that,
I would have already returned the thing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Incredible magical power is required to move
the compass—the kind of power that shortens
one's very life. I can ill afford to expend such power in the
midst of a war with the Calamity, which is
why I cannot manipulate the compass.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Never! Out of the question! A witch of a
different color can never be permitted
to manipulate our compass—and neither
can you Watchers!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Enough of this! The strange ones here have
overstayed their welcome, which has caused
the pinwheel's foul mood to descend ever
deeper into brood and bile. How am I going to put this right...?
Ugh. I feel a headache coming on.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_000.text:
Aaand your pinwheel zipped off again.
I have no idea how we're supposed to
get this compass back to normal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
We went to the Dusk Pinwheel and heard
all about the compass situation from the
Yellow Sage. Know anything about that, Willma?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
...It's my fault. I got close to the compass,
and it angered the pinwheel.
Oh, I really AM a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Whaaat!? Okay, come on! A golem could NEVER
become an apprentice witch! Plus, we've been
friends since we were kids.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text: But everyone else already passed their Witchterms, and I haven't even been allowed to take mine! ...It's because I'm a golem.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Would you stop being weird already!?
You have powerful magic—I KNOW you do!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text: I did have powerful magic—but now everyone else is a full witch, and I'm still an apprentice. My strength in the past was just a golem's strength, and that's why I'm not growing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
We should probably leave her alone.
Also, what's a golem?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
They're artificial life-forms made by witches
of the yellow. They can do manual labor and
other basic tasks, though I'm not sure if they
ever made one that looks human.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
Impressive if true, because she
looks completely human to me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_020.text:
It's clear Willma got near the compass,
which gives us plenty to ask about.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Oh, for heaven's sake... What is it now!?
You people can't just keep barging into
the pinwheel whenever you like!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I want to know why you've never let Willma
take her Witchterms. She and I are the same
age, so she should've been able to take 'em
around the same time as me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Tsk! You white witches have such a lack of
discipline. Always running about meddling
in the affairs of other colors.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Well aware, thanks. But here's the thing:
Willma's so upset about it, she actually
thinks she might be a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Don't be daft! If we could make golems with
the ability of witches, we'd simply mass-
produce them to fight the Calamity for us! Willma's case is just a matter of timing.
We have to work around to her turn, find a
suitable world for the exam, and so forth.
There's nothing sinister about it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Willma said she approached
the compass and made it angry.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text: She got a reaction from the compass just by approaching it? I find that hard to believe; she'd have to have either the most perfect or the most terrible affinity with it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I want to try one more time to see if the
pinwheel finds me worthy—and if it does,
I want to finally take my Witchterms!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Not even I can say what will happen if you
approach it again, girl—particularly if your
affinity does turn out to be poor.
You could lose your magic—or even your life. But I imagine you're prepared for that,
so perhaps...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Just...just a little more...
Please find me worthy...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
I can help this child, Watchers,
but I will require your aid.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
The Yellow Sage would blow a gasket
if she found out about this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.speaker: Unknown_Person
Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_040.text:
Well, we definitely don't want Willma
to lose her life, so I guess we just
have to let you do your thing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_050.text:
Yeah, seems like it—especially since
the Dusk Pinwheel has returned
to its original location.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
If you seek Willma, she is resting within.
And yes, she was successful; I'll schedule
her Witchterms as soon as possible.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Don't bother. I'm not going to be a witch.
The compass showed me a different path. I'd never even considered doing something else
with my life, but now that I am, it's lifted
a huge weight off my shoulders. So no, I won't be a witch. Instead,
I'm going to visit worlds with the Watchers!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Will you bring me with you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Sure, climb aboard.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: I think you should reconsider.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Thank you. And pray forgive me,
Yellow Sage.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
If that is your decision, I must accept it.
However, this is the first time I have ever
heard of a Watcher leaving with a witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
She alone made the decision
to travel with me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
The Dusk Pinwheel is returned to its
rightful place, and Willma has forged
for herself a new path. With the pinwheel now o'erflowing with magic,
it is time for me to put the finishing touch
on these events.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
So long as I, the Yellow Sage, stand ready,
I shall never permit the crystals of the
Calamity to take root in our lands! O Dusk Pinwheel! Gather the power of
this land and us witches of the yellow,
and rid us of the Calamity's menace!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Okay, SERIOUSLY!? What the hell!?
I sounded SO cool and decisive there,
but now you've gone and killed it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I would not permit it even if
the Watchers were willing, child.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Yikes. Lady really put her
serious face on for that one.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
The witches of Pulchra have rules, Willma:
you go to another world for your Witchterms,
and determine based on that experience
whether or not you wish to become a full witch. THAT is the meaning of the path the compass
has shown you—it has naught whatsoever
to do with these Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
...I understand, great sage, and will patiently
await my Witchterms—but in order to do that,
we must first defeat the Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
Willma, are you sure about this?
You wanted to be a witch so badly,
so are you SURE it's all right to
join up with these two?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I appreciate the concern, but I'll be fine.
The compass only showed me the path; I'm the
one who decided to take it, and I'm the one
who'll take responsibility.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
I know she says she's good with it, but if
anything happens to her, you're gonna have
the witches of Pulchra to answer to, ladies! Oh, and nobody goes anywhere until
AFTER you finish watching over
the Calamity! Got it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text: Yes yes, well aware.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_060.text:
We have to beat the Calamity fast—
for Willma and everyone else! C'mon!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I suppose the truth always comes out eventually.
I also knew Willma would realize it at some point,
which is why I wanted her to take her Witchterms
as soon as she possibly could. But those other old crones dithered and
delayed, and now we must deal with it
in the middle of a Calamity!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
So Willma being a golem really WAS
the reason the compass went wild?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Did I not tell you before she lacks such
strength? While a golem is essentially a
mass of magical power, such a thing is not
enough to explain the compass's behavior.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Okay, but if the compass moved on its own,
that PROVES Willma has crazy power, right?
And that's why the windmill keeps flying
around—it wants you to get the message!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
...Could it be? Am I the one who doesn't
understand? Am I the one who doesn't
believe in Willma? Am I just the same as
all those other crones? Oh, by the hells!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I'm so sorry, Willma! I have watched you
grow since the day of your birth, and yet
did not believe you possessed the strength
to overcome your limits as a golem!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
Then please permit me to approach the compass.
If it has deemed me worthy, it should return to
its proper place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_041.text:
I suppose it isn't the way of the witch
to worry about worst-case scenarios... Very well, Willma. I will allow it.
Fie, but it is vexing that I was the
one being so fickle about all of this.
I almost cannot bear the thought.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
If you seek Willma, she is resting within;
she stretched her magical power to the limit
in order to maintain her golem body. Oh, but I was so worried watching it.
I thought she might return to the earth.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Nonetheless, this should force the old crones
into letting her take the Witchterms. For who
are we to judge when she has been found
worthy by the Dusk Pinwheel itself?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
If this is your choice, I will allow it.
You are free, after all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Just the type of sound advice I
would expect from the Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Willma, you go to another world for your
Witchterms, and determine based on that
experience whether or not you wish to
become a full-fledged witch. THAT is the meaning of the path the compass
has shown you—it has naught whatsoever
to do with these Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
I still can't believe you're a golem, but...
Well, look. What I DO know is that you and
me always wanted to become witches together,
so I want you to keep at it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text: I do want to be a witch! That hasn't changed. It's just that... Well, I can see a different possibility, and I guess I want to take my chances on it. After all, doing things differently is the witches' way, right?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
Well, no matter where you go or what you do,
you'll always have friends in the Witchdom.
Don't forget that, all right?
