SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_YELLOW_CASTLE_061.text:
You can take Willma with you once you're
done overseeing the Calamity, Watchers.
Until then, she needs to continue performing
her duties as a witch of the yellow.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text: Psst! Hey, have you heard the gossip?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Ooo, hot goss? Spill it! Uh, I mean, I'm not sure we
should gossip around...you know?
Watch watch? Hint hint? Nudge nud—

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Here's the deal: two witches
of the white are MISSING!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Are you certain they're missing?
Maybe the fighting is just making it
difficult for them to contact you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Nope! They're definitely missing. See, 'cause when we go into battle,
we cast enchantments that ensure we have
a complete understanding of each other's
locations before we ever engage the enemy.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
So no matter where a witch goes, we always
know just where she is—even if she gets
turned to crystal!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text: Okay, so maybe they went AWOL.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Abso-LUTELY not! No way! If we lose the battle
with the Calamity, witches won't even be able
to BE witches anymore! There's nowhere to run,
and both of these witches would know that!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
Witches aren't robots, though. It wouldn't be
the first time during a war that someone knew
the right thing to do in their head, but just
couldn't make their heart follow through.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
There isn't a witch in the world who wants
to lose to the Calamity. No, I'm sure they
just got wrapped up in something or other. And look, I know your Watcher stuff is
important and all, but I'm gonna try
and find these missing witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text: All right. Where do we start?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_WAVE1_OUTPOST_WHI.text:
We'll look, um... Somewhere?
Did you hear anything about
where they were going?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Fine timing, m'lady! We just saw two people who
looked like the missing witches enter the mine.
We were going to pursue them, but thought we
should let the witches know first.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
That was the right decision: Spirits are
known to appear in this mine, so it would
be super dangerous for you squires to go
poking around. Just wait for us, 'kay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Of course, m'lady.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Why in the world would those two
have wandered into a mine?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: For materials, maybe? Wait, do you even need materials?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Of course! I mean, we can do anything with
enough magic, but having stuff like ore lets
us create things more easily—and with less
magical power—than we could otherwise.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
The idea of a witch in a mining helmet
doesn't really square with the image
I have in my head.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Well then, I'll show you how it's done.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh, there's a good one!
It's perfect for your first time.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: ...That was mining?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I mean, kinda? We let the fiends dig stuff up,
then we just...y'know! Have 'em share a little.
A totally respectable mining operation, right?
Anyway, here. Have some of what they dropped.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I know they're fiends and all,
but I still can't help feeling
a little guilty about that.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, now that you know how we mine,
we can get back to looking for the
missing witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Whoa! Cave-in! You okay!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yes, I'm fine. Did that happen
because of the mining we did?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Nah, that was plain ol' bad luck.
Anyhoo, let's light things up a bit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
This isn't exactly how I pictured our
witch search going. At this point,
they might end up searching for us.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I'm sure the squires outside went to
tell somebody, so help is on the way.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Hello? Anyone there!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Called it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Here they are!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We felt a rumbling from the direction of the mine
and came to investigate. We thought it strange
that there were two squires at the entrance,
so we went deeper and voila! Here you are.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh! You're the Watchers, aren't you?
Oh, but this is our lucky day!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
The squires outside said they saw
two missing witches come in here.
Do you know anything about that?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Missing witches...? Ah, I see. Those
squires must be spreading the rumors.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, as you can clearly see,
we're not missing.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
So you ARE the witches people
are talking about?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
It certainly seems that way—though I don't
have the faintest idea why they're telling
everyone we've gone missing. Perhaps those
squires just have it out for you Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Ha! I can't wait to see the look on their
faces when they learn the subjects of their
little rumorfest showed up to help you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
And with that, we're going after them.
Be well, you two!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Thanks.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We went in to save them, but ended up
GETTING saved. Man, I really panicked
there for a bit, huh? Guess I was just
worried they might really have run off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Eh, it's not your fault.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Psst! Hey, have you heard the gossip?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
If you mean the one about how two 'missing'
witches ended up rescuing the Watchers'
party from a cave-in, then we heard it. 
Also, not gossip. Super real. Source: me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I hear they were even praised for their
actions by the White Sage herself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Sounds about right. Meanwhile, I almost
got the Watchers KILLED! Mom's gonna let
me have it for sure. Ugh.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Aw, cheer up! Gloom isn't like you.
That said, we need to catch those
two suspicious squires on the double.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Oh no! This time I'M gonna be the one
to catch 'em and totally redeem myself!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: That's the spirit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Impeccable timing, Watchers. We just chased
those two squires into the greenhouse,
and you were here to see it all.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Leave catching those two to me.
We actually talked to 'em last time,
so I'll know if it's them or not.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yes, I suppose even a lowly squire can't
be taken into custody without evidence.
Go on—one of us will be right behind you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
This greenhouse looked small from the outside,
but it sure isn't small on the inside.
Must be magic at work again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Yep! Also, we'll get lost if we aren't careful;
I don't even know how big this place is.
Oh, and don't let your guard down,
or you'll totally end up as plant food.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I've got a bad feeling about this.
Let's find the squires and get out of here.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I'll start searching here, Watchers.
Why don't you head in that direction?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I saw the squires over there!
After them, Watchers!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: There.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Careful now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Maybe this way?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Ameya, watch out!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
How many of them do we have to
deal with here!? What a pain.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Are you all right, Watchers!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, nothing has eaten us yet,
so I suppose that's a yes.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Unfortunately, the squires were supper.
All that's left is their armor.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Mmm, I see.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
That's their armor all right. Too bad.
I was hoping to catch and question them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well, that's a bummer. Now we'll never
know what they were after you for.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Unless we can ask them directly?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
What, like with necromancy? No!
That's one of Pulchra's forbidden
schools of magic!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You're a witch of the white, right?
Let's ask the White Sage for help.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You want me to ask MOM for help!?
Also, help with what?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: You'll just have to wait and see.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
The Watchers would like to do some mining,
and they wish all of you to accompany them.
They would also like to give you the fruits of
this labor as thanks for how you've aided them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I ask that you accept their proposal for two
reasons. First, it is a kind offer, and you
have most definitely earned this thanks.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: But also, I wish to observe them, for I can't help but wonder why they want to mine for ore in the midst of the Calamity. Please report back if you learn anything suspicious.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Of course.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: With pleasure.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Well? How was that? As you see,
I told the truth, even if it
was not the entirety of it. That said, I admit to harboring some doubts
about you Watchers, because you are most
certainly hiding something. Is there some
reason you're being targeted?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: A weird voice is talking to us.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: We're not hiding anything.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We heard a voice telling us
not to trust witches.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
We don't know who actually was saying it
or what they want—and I also don't know
if it's the reason we're being targeted.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I appreciate your honesty, and may have an
inkling who this mysterious voice belongs to.
Regardless, it seems you are VERY important
to them, Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Now please make your way to the mines.
They will grow suspicious if you're late.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
What are you scheming here,
Grey Witch...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Thanks for accepting our invitation today.
I'm a bit of a mining amateur, so it's
really reassuring to have your help.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: We'll dig up lots of good stuff!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Also—and this is just a rumor—
but apparently ghosts sometimes
show up in this mine?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
There have been occasions in which a spirit
attracts a ghost—it's truly terrifying.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Agreed. Ghosts are the WORST.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Right then. Let's make sure we hold hands
and stick together if one does show.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Thanks!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: It's a little dark.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: It doesn't get any brighter.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Why... Why did you kill...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: EEEK! S-S-SQUIRE GHOST!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: But... But how is this possible?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: B-b-b-but...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Melting... I'm melting...
My body is melting away...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Nooo! I'm sorry, Mr. Ghost!
Please forgive me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Okay, now this is just getting annoying.
Enough tricks, spirit! Why are you showing
us some imaginary squire ghost!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Don't run... Take me with you...
Take my hand...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch2
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Eeek! No, don't hold my hand!
Wait, you CAN'T hold my hand!
I'm YOU! You're ME! Noooooo!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: SquireFake1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Pfffffft! Ha ha ha! Sorry, darlin'!
I can't take it no more!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You're a surprisingly good actress, Bonnie.
You really disappeared into the role.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
You knew there were no squires
from the very beginning?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Sure did! I mean, we didn't think anyone would
try to pull something so elaborate, but things
at the greenhouse laid on pretty thick.
Gosh, but this was a hoot! Ha ha ha!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
So what now? Will you reveal our scheme
and hand us over to the White Sage?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Nope. We're Watchers—we watch.
What you do is up to you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
There is something I want to ask, though:
Have you heard a mysterious voice
telling you not to trust witches?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: WhiteWitch1
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Uh, no? I mean, what kind of idiot would
tell a witch not to trust a witch?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text: Fair point. All right, you can go.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
I can't believe the two of them actually
thought that would work! Man, maybe
I'm not that good at judging people...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_WHITE.text:
Don't get your chaps in a twist over it,
hon. This kind of thing happens.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: This guy doesn't seem like a witch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Pulchra is populated by both witches and the
squires who serve them. This guy's a squire,
so he serves witches. Make sense?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It greatly saddens me to hear you all speak so
indifferently toward a beleaguered squire such
as I. For is it not a rule of this world that we
should offer words of support to social lessers?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Oh, fine. What's on your mind?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
How very kind of you to ask! You see, m'ladies,
I am a squire who uses a particular set of
skills in service to witches of the red. Alas, I have recently been given commands by both
the honorable Red Sage and her glorious elder
sister, the Red Orchid, and now find myself at
a loss over whose order I should prioritize.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Hierarchically, I should put the Red Sage above
all others. The Red Orchid, however, has always
held my skill in high esteem, and I should like
to prove she is not mistaken in that evaluation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: And what have they asked of you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The Red Sage has commanded me to assassinate
the Red Orchid. The Red Orchid, conversely,
has baded me assassinate the Red Sage. I believe the term for my skills would be
'wetwork' in some circles? But to put a
finer point on it, I am an assassin.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I beg you, m'ladies! Help me solve this
most vexatious of workplace conundrums!
Whose order should I carry out?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Don't murder EITHER of them.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: That's not my call.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Those two are ALWAYS fighting about
one thing or another, so just ignore it. I mean, just because you're a squire doesn't
mean you need to take every word they say
seriously—especially when they're trying to
put hits out on each other!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'll go get them to make up—and since
I think this qualifies as 'watching,'
you can come, too.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Ignore a witch's command?
I've never considered such a thing!
Could I truly get away with it?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
But she's right: if I were to carry out both sets of
orders, I would have negated neither in the end.
Indeed, that seems the only way I can fulfill
my duties in their entirety!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I know sisters sometimes don't get along,
but I've never heard of any who decided
to put out hits on each other.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The Red Sage is the Red Orchid's little sister—
and the Red Orchid is one of the most powerful
witches in all Pulchra. But here's the thing: nobody knows how the
Red Orchid feels about being passed over
for sage in favor of her little sister.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Also, the people around them are constantly
running off on some random whim or another,
which doesn't help matters.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
What errand brings you here, Watchers?
I scarce need you two to look after me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
We hear you and your sister are
trying to have each other killed.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So the Red Orchid put out her own order,
did she? I always knew we were alike
in some rather strange ways. However, your concern is unwarranted,
because I do not fear assassination.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I don't care. I'm not going to let
the two of you murder each other
while we stand around and watch.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
AAANYWAY, we need the two of you to make up.
If there's anything we can do to help that along,
we'll do it—'cause this is no time for two of our
best witches to be fighting!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I know how foolish this all must seem to you,
given the times we now find ourselves in.
But in truth, the course of events often
hinges upon such things as this.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
There is something in the Scorching Tower
that hails from our memories; I wonder if
my sister recalls it? The answer to that question could cause us
to lay down our arms—or more specifically,
to point them at the Calamity instead
of one another.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Tower, memories, got it. We'll swing by
the Red Orchid's place and let her know.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
What errand brings you to
this battlefield?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
There's something from your memories in the
Scorching Tower—something you share with
your sister. Do you remember what it is?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Do you take me for a fool?
I'm not so absent-minded as
to forget something like that! But also, this is none of your business.
I understand her feelings and what she's
attempting to do, and that is enough.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So I can assume you two are gonna
make up and NOT kill each other?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
You can. I will set off for
the Flame Fortress at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
After reflecting on things, I realize
ordering your assassination was...
Well, let's call it overkill.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I feel exactly the same, Sister.
Also, I can't believe you remembered it.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Yes, and I'll never forget it.
Not for the rest of my life.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: A drink for m'ladies, if it please?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
You? Bringing us tea? Oh ho ho!
Sister, this tea is clearly poisoned.
I advise you to drink it with care.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Worry not, sister of mine: I've cast an
enchantment on myself that detoxifies
everything that I consume.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: GYAAA!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The slimy cur put a poisoned needle
on the CUP instead of in the drink!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Just so, Red Orchid! The tea was a mere
distraction so you might lower your
guard regarding the cup itself. At last, I have done it! Not even
the great Red Orchid was able to
see through my deception!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Sister...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: I'm sorry...Zhu Ya...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I have done it! I carried out both
sets of orders at the same time!
What a great success!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
THEY JUST MADE UP, YOU CHOWDERHEAD!
WHAT THE HECK ARE YOU DOING!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Wait, really? Oh. Oh no.
What HAVE I done!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Do you have an antidote!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Errr... No. But I can make one,
provided I have a scale from
the Salamander!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Sounds like we're headed to
the Scorching Tower! C'mon!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchNormal
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: There's the assassin!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Get in the tower! Quick!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: No time. Tell me what to do.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
If m'ladies would be so good as to draw the
Salamander's attention? While you do,
I'll pick up a scale once it falls off.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Why not catch the Salamander
and just peel a scale off?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well, that's a simply ridiculous idea.
Now go on with you!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Do we need anything else?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
This will do for now—although it
may prove rather difficult to drink.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: They'll have to power through. Hurry!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Zhu Ya!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'm all right, Sister—although slightly vexed
we had to be saved by the Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
An utter disgrace, to be certain.
Now where is that squire!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I am here, m'ladies, and will accept
any punishment you deem fit.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
As we hold some blame here, perhaps we can all
just agree to be more careful in the future.
In the meantime, continue honing your skills so
you might do more good for us witches of the red.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: It would be my pleasure, m'lady.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well then, Sister? Let us use the power of
the Salamander that rests within us to
cooperate and incinerate the Calamity
crystals which blanket our lands.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Quite so. We will begin at once.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Looks like it all worked out.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: That whole situation was insane.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Guess we're back to watching, then!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
One of the Red Sage's little riddles, is it?
Well, perhaps I will pose one of my own:
the both of us went to retrieve a thing,
but ended up leaving a thing behind.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
I'm sure you Watchers can puzzle this out.
Once you know both what we went to get
and what was left behind, return to me
and I will make peace with my sister.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Riddle time, Watchers!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Well? Did you solve the riddle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
We won't know until we go inside.
So what kind of place is this tower?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Oh, pretty much what it looks like!
There's a fire spirit called the
Salamander in there.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So the riddle might have
something to do with fire.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Oh, look! Fireproof gloves.
Two, in fact—one from each pair.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Guess they definitely came here to get
a scale from the Salamander, huh?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
We'll draw the Salamander's attention;
you grab the gloves and the scale.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Smart thinking. You got it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
That went great! Er, but I don't get why they
left the gloves here. I mean, how did they
plan to get the scale back without 'em?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Be that as it may, m'ladies, I received no
countermanding command. And as you know,
I am a squire, and the orders I receive
from witches are absolute. And with that, my duty is done.
Fare you well!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: No, wait!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
The assassin would probably be carrying
an antidote. We have to go after him!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Witch rules here too, huh?
Seems like a squire's life is tough.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So what, you're on the
assassin's side now?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Merely an observation.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Well, well! The two of you clearly want an
antidote! Yet, did it ever occur to you—even
for a moment—that I might not have one?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Uh...no?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
If there's one thing I loathe,
it's undeserved confidence.
That's enough of you, Watcher!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
...Here. The antidote. It's made from a
scale of the Salamander, and should
revive flames that have been lost.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
So you had it this whole time? Heh.
I'm guessing you never intended to
kill them in the first place.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Those two witches gave my orders,
and their orders are absolute.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
But as I have managed to fulfill both
sets of orders, I now answer to no one—
and I will never relinquish this newfound
freedom! Never, I say! Huzzah!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Oh no! He jumped!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
We need to hurry and get this
antidote where it needs to be.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: ...Er, right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: ...He's free now.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: RedWitchOrchid
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
It saddens me to think I let such a brilliant
squire die in vain—and I swear here and now,
I will never permit such a thing again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text: Well, I guess it worked out...okay?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_RED_0.text:
Don't know if I'd go that far,
but at least the sisters are alive.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
What's Mother doing under the tree?
Oh, I don't like this at all...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Are you all right!? Say something!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The crystallization has
found its way here...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
This is Lita's familiar, Pierre.
What are you doing here, Pierre!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: Sorry, we're all out of frog snacks.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
I think this frog wants us to do something.
You don't speak Amphibian, do you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
We're heading under the Tree of the Forever Young,
to the place where its roots extend.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Wait, I can't go? Oh, c'mon!
They get to go, but I can't!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
A Calamity crystal! This must be
what you wanted to tell us about.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The crystal is digging into the roots—
so no matter how many times we destroy it,
it's just going to leech out the castle's
power and come back again.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
I could destroy the crystallization by killing
the roots, but there's no telling what would
happen to the castle if I did that. Oh man,
what the heck are we supposed to dooo!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Oh! He wants to use the
poison spring in the Bluewood!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Wouldn't that spread poison to the castle?
That seems problematic.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Well, it'd mess their stomachs up good if
witches or animals drank it, but since the
plants around here seem fine, I thiiink
the castle should be okay? But...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Is the poison going to work
on the crystal, though?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Well yeah, that's the thing. I mean,
Pierre seems pretty convinced, but a
familiar's just a familiar, ya know?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Pierre, look! It's Lita! Er...but what
the heck is she doing? And how come
she doesn't seem to notice us?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
She's drinking from the spring—which I
seem to recall you saying was a bad idea.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Hang on... Hang ON! Oh my gosh,
have the two of them swapped BODIES!?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Okay, so something weird happened beneath
the castle and the two of you ended up
swapping bodies—which explains why you
refused to let me go underground! Aw, thanks so much, Lita! If it wasn't
for you, I'd be a cat right now!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Is it okay to drink so much
poison spring water, Pierre?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
In that case, we should hurry back
to the castle and destroy the crystal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
First, we soak the roots with
the poison spring water...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The crystals changed color!
I think the poison's working.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text: All right, time to break some crystal.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: Lita_Caryx
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
Oh, Pierre! You protected my body!
You knew all of this would happen
and switched in order to protect me!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.speaker: BlueWiseWitch
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_COLOR_QUEST_BLUE_.text:
The Tree of the Forever Young has been revived.
Let us wield its youthful vitality to rid ourselves
of these crystals.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text:
If we don't do something to turn the tide,
everything will be blanketed in crystal.
Speaking of, what happens to the witches
inside a crystalized castle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_000.text:
But we won't give up because we lost one
castle, so please keep watching over us.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.text:
We lost another castle to crystallization?
Damn it! I knew a battle with the Calamity
would be hard, but THIS hard...?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_010.text:
No, Ameya! Don't give in to despair!
There's still hope!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.text:
A third castle, gone! We're gonna
lose to the Calamity at this rate!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_020.text:
We might not find the triangle we're looking
for if the witches lose to the Calamity,
so I'm thinking it may be time for us
to stop watching and start acting.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.text:
We lost a fourth castle. There's only
one left, so we have to protect it!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_030.text: We must hold fast—now more than ever.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_040.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_CASTLE_FALLEN_040.text:
It's over... Every castle that protects
Pulchra has been consumed by crystal...

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
Ameya disappeared. I wonder what's going
to happen to this world now that... Huh?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
Now what in tarnation is one of our triangles
doin' in a place like this? Did one'a them
witches leave it here?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_AMYA_RETURN_100_CUT_00.text:
Well, they're a curious bunch,
so I wouldn't put it past them.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Where should we go now?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
The Arch Witch said you could go anywhere
you like—apparently things will happen
just by your being there.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Seems pretty loosey-goosey,
but all right.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Yeah, it sort of makes me wonder what
the Watchers are even FOR, y'know?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: I imagine things will change even in places we Watchers don't visit, yes?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Though all witches are fighting for our lives,
we don't fully understand the Calamity's power.
We just know we have to drive it back—
and that we're not going to lose!

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Well, I hope we're able to help,
even if just a little.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
I appreciate the sentiment,
but this is a fight for us witches.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So what's the Arch Witch up to while
the other witches are fighting?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
She keeps vigil in the Brilliant Tower,
ensuring that the balance of spirit
energy is maintained.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Is this tower special somehow?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Mana gathers there from throughout the
Conjoined Worlds—that power is the only
reason witches even exist.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
And she distributes it to the other witches?
Like a quartermaster for magic?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Well, it's a little different than that. ...Actually, a lot different. ...Actually, completely different. But hey, you're Watchers, not witches. You don't really need to get it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Huh. I thought things would look a lot
more dire when the witches lost a base.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Thankfully, the Arch Witch is in the
Brilliant Tower trying to minimize the
impact of that kind of thing—and her
power is SUPER impressive.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: So she's your queen or something?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Uh, that's not... No. You make it sound
like some sort of master-servant thing,
but it's not like that at all. Also, we're not fighting this battle because
she's ordering us to. Battling the Calamity
is just a thing witches do.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Hmm. The more you know.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
So if all the crystals are destroyed,
the witches win. But if the world is
covered in them, the Calamity wins.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text:
Yup! But don't forget that witches have the
power to turn the tide in a single moment.
So long as we have even the slightest chance,
we can totally win this thing.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: It's nice to have hope.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_0.text: Not hope. Conviction.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
There are so many places to see...
Where should we start?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Just head off to wherever strikes
your fancy! Can't be in multiple
places at the same time, after all.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
You don't have a spell to make
copies of us or something?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
You're thinking of a ninja.
We're WITCHES.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
It's disappointing that I have this great chance
to meet fantastical people like witches here,
but I can't actually sit and talk with them
because of this stupid Calamity.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Especially because outsiders coming to
Pulchra is super rare! This is a really
hard world to get into, y'know.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Yep. But hey, that's why
you two are the Watchers!

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I feel like I've come to understand
a little more about witches.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I guess the Calamity woke something in us.
Stuff that wouldn't normally happen is...
Well, it's happening.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
I can't even imagine what
will happen next...

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Look, I know being the Watcher can make it feel
like you're just standing around watching stuff,
but this is serious business, so don't let the
other witches hear you talking like that.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text: Sorry. Didn't mean anything by it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
This fight is really dragging on.
Is everything going to be all right?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Well, I think the witches might be wearing
out a little—but we can't whine or complain!
I mean, the enemy's a bunch of crystal, so it
won't be griping anytime soon, you know?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
Yes, I suppose a protracted war
would put you at a disadvantage.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_1.text:
For sure. I wish I could snap my fingers
and have it all be over, but that might
just be my own personal preference.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Why do you continue
your vigil, Watchers?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Because it doesn't seem like we'll be able
to look for the triangle until our work
here is done.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
You are mistaken. The Arch Witch's ensorcelled
words are a curse, one that has bound your very
souls to the task. You have been much deceived.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text: Even if we did tell duty to take a hike and went looking for the triangle, the Arch Witch probably wouldn't let us leave. Also, you're one to talk about deception; everything you say is extremely shady.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
You got pretty quiet there.
Everything okay?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
I do not hate all the witches.
On the contrary, one could say
I love each of them individually.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
The Arch Witch and sages, however, are a
different tale, for they are corrupt beings
that are neither great nor wise.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Without your strength, they would have
no chance of saving Pulchra. Therefore,
there is no value in aiding them.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text: And there is value in aiding you? I doubt that.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Unknown_Person
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
Ah, but what if I make it so you might
accomplish your goal immediately?

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text:
We're not so morally bankrupt that we'd
take help from a shady character like you.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_MYSTERIOUS_VOICE_.text: Wait, WHO'S shady!? Not this girl!

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
I'm starting to wonder if this
fight is ever going to end.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
Oh, we're close. I can feel
the Calamity's power waning.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text:
I'm starting to wonder if this
fight is ever going to end.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text: Victory is coming—I'm certain of it.

SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_FUNC_BOFO_AMYA_OUTPOST_CONTROL_9.text: I'm going to assume you're right.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_WHITE_000_CUT.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_WHITE_000_CUT.text:
Is he trying to scare us or something?
Because that was pretty lame.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_WHITE_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_WHITE_000_CUT.text:
Well, shoot! There really WAS a squire
who got melted!? This whole thing stinks
to high heaven of Quis Statoom!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_RED_000_CUT_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_RED_000_CUT_0.text:
Finally, I don't have to worry about
being caught between their orders anymore!
Oh, and this is for you, with my thanks.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_RED_000_CUT_0.speaker: SquireAssasin
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_RED_000_CUT_0.text:
Interpret it how you will, Watchers;
it no longer concerns me.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_RED_000_CUT_0.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_RED_000_CUT_0.text:
Does this mean them Kiss Palladium folks
set us up to help that feller?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_BLUE_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_BLUE_000_CUT_.text:
Pierre? What were you doing
with this triangle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_BLUE_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_BLUE_000_CUT_.text:
Hate to say it, darlin', but I still
don't speak a lick of Frog. Do you think them Cuss Studio
fellers are behind all this?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_BLACK_000_CUT.speaker: BlackWitchGrete
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_BLACK_000_CUT.text:
I think this triangle thingy might've been
the reason I lost my bearings, so to speak.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_BLACK_000_CUT.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_BLACK_000_CUT.text:
Ha! Like we'd ever let them Kross Storm
fellers get one over on us!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_YELLOW_000_CU.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_YELLOW_000_CU.text:
I'm going to become a witch,
so I don't need THIS!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_YELLOW_000_CU.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_YELLOW_000_CU.text: Uh, why did Willma have a triangle?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_YELLOW_000_CU.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_YELLOW_000_CU.text:
'Cause them Crease Stamina fellers
have a finger in every dang pie!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_YELLOW_010_CU.speaker: YellowWitchWillma
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_YELLOW_010_CU.text:
I'm not a golem,
which means I don't need THIS!

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.text:
With the Calamity over,
this belongs to you.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.text:
Not sure what it is, actually; I figured it
was some kind of mark that proved I was the
girl chosen to guide the Watchers.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.speaker: Bonnie_Blair
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.text: Did the Arch Witch give this to you?

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.speaker: Ameya_Aisling
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.text:
No, it just sort of appeared. I mean,
clearly someone used magic to send it
to me, but I have no idea if that was
the Arch Witch or not.

SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.speaker: Formina_Franklyn
SUB_W02_EVAR_BOFO_TRIANGLE_AMYA_000_CUT_.text:
Well, I think we're close to our goal now,
so let's get going.
